HighBodyFatPercentagePanda.Description: A giant panda that attacks slowly with great force

RedPanda.Description: A red panda that swipes quickly to incapacitate enemies

Bamboo.Description: After gaining sentience, the bamboo have collectively decided upon world domination. Bamboos attack swiftly inflicting tiny cuts over their prey.

Bamboo2.Description: New generation Bamboo that has developed greater resilience as well as harder hitting attacks
